text: Leonardo Gabriel Ruíz Serpa (born 9 December 2000) is a Peruvian footballer who plays as a forward for Peruvian Primera División side Sport Boys. ==Club career== ===Sport Boys=== After a good season as topscorer for Sport Boys' reserve team with 10 goals in the 2019 season,Felicitamos a Leonardo Ruiz por su debut en primera división..., facebook.com, 17 February 2020 he was promoted to the first team squad in January 2020.Descarga Rosada - 🎉Promovidos del plantel de reserva al..., facebook.com, 4 January 2020 He got his official debut for Sport Boys on 15 February 2020 against Carlos A. Mannucci.SPORT BOYS VS. CARLOS MANNUCCI 3 - 3, soccerway.com, 15 February 2020 Ruíz started on the bench, before replacing Eduardo Uribe in the 68th minute. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Living people Category:2000 births Category:Association football forwards Category:Peruvian footballers Category:Peruvian Primera División players Category:Sport Boys footballers Category:People from Lima
title: Leonardo Ruíz
